data.title: Protection For DC Traction Systems With Regenerative Braking PDF
data.meta_description: Protection for DC Traction Systems with Regenerative Braking.pdf - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This master's thesis focuses on analyzing the interference that regenerative braking causes on protection of DC traction systems. The student created a Simulink model of a subway system to simulate various fault conditions. The simulations revealed faults that can cause protections to fail. Based on the results, the thesis proposes a new protection scheme and examines its performance during ground faults and short-circuits. The scheme aims to overcome problems introduced by regenerative braking technology.
